synopsis.text:
Though living in poverty in Italy, Marco's life is filled with joy and love from his family. When his mother leaves for Argentina to work and help pay off his father's debts, Marco's world is turned upside down. The once cheerful boy is now filled with a void that no amount of time or friends can fill. His mother's regular letters are his only solace, but when they suddenly stop, Marco becomes overwhelmed with worry.

Despite his young age, Marco decides to embark on a daring journey to Argentina in search of his mother. Although his father is initially hesitant, he is eventually moved by Marco's determination and allows him to go. As Marco travels across the vast landscapes of Argentina, he encounters numerous people and experiences a myriad of adventures that help him grow and mature.

Through his journey, Marco discovers the strength within himself and learns to accept who he is. Will Marco be able to find his mother and fill the void in his heart? Join Marco on his incredible adventure of self-discovery and love in this heartwarming anime.
